minecraft:lore: A Guide to the arcane arts

pages.text: Behold, the ancient guide to ascend as a TRUE Mage. The path is arduous and shrouded in mystery, yet in time thou shalt master its secrets.
First, thou must forge thine initial wand — for this sacred tool, gather thee three wooden rods.

§l§6On the Path of Power§r

To rise in the ranks of Magehood, thou must gather experience. Slay beasts, perform rituals, and invoke spells to increase thine Mage Level.

§l§6The Art of Spellcraft§r

Spells are woven through ancient rites. To forge a spell, thou requireth two things: a wand imbued with potential, and thy own experience levels to fuel the incantation.

§l§6Unlocking New Spells§r

With each ascended Mage Level, new and greater magicks shall be revealed unto thee. Seek hidden scrolls and experiment to unlock their might.

§l§6Essence of Creation§r

To create a spell, thou must invoke the crafting of the arcane. Be prepared: a portion of thine experience shall be consumed, alongside the charge of thy wand.

§l§6The Wands of Power§r

Wands are not mere sticks; they are vessels of arcane focus. There exist six known types, each with its own strength and rarity:

§l§7Wooden Wand§r — The humble beginning. Least durable, most costly for spellwork.

§l§8Stone Wand§r — A modest upgrade, slightly reducing magick cost.

§l§fIron Wand§r — A reliable conduit, offering balanced cost and power.

§l§6Golden Wand§r — A fickle, fragile focus; yet its spells cost significantly less magick.

§l§bDiamond Wand§r — A rare and potent instrument, greatly reducing magickal expense.

§l§5Netherite Wand§r — The pinnacle of arcane craft. Spells cast with this wand cost the least magick and possess unparalleled might.

§l§6Final Counsel§r

Wield thine wand with wisdom, for with greater power comes greater risk. Channel thy magick sparingly, lest thou find thyself depleted when most in need.

§l§2May the Threads of Magick forever weave through thy soul, brave Mage.§r

§oThis tome shall serve as thine guide on the mystic path...
